channel.title: Unix - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in Unix on Today I Learnt...

item.title: About `xargs -t`
item.description: Which echos the command to be executed to standard error immediately before it is executed.

item.title: What the sections of the Unix manual are
item.description: From man man: MANUAL SECTIONS The standard sections of the manual include: 1 User Commands 2 System Calls 3 C Library Functions 4 Devices and Special Files 5 File Formats and Conventions 6 Games et.

item.title: The order of permissions matters with `chmod`
item.description: As in these two commands behave differently: $ chmod -R g+X,g-wx .
